reuters.title: PANCANADIAN TO SELL NORTH SEA PROPERTIES, UNIT TO WHITEHALL FOR CASH
reuters.body: Reidel Environmental Technologies Inc said its Reidel Envirnomental Services Inc unit won a contract with the Environmental Protection Agency that could total over 100 mln dlrs over the next four years. Under the agreement, which began March 1, Reidel will act as the prime contractor for the cleanup and removal of hazardous substances from contaminated sites in the EPA's Zone IV, which encompasses 23 states west of the Mississippi.
